thread.title: Watch a Dinosaur Try to Train for American Ninja Warrior
thread.title_full: Watch a Dinosaur Try to Train for American Ninja Warrior | Maxim

author: Jared Keller
title: Watch a Dinosaur Try to Train for American Ninja Warrior
text:
American Ninja Warrior is a sports competition that currently airs on NBC and the Esquire Network. Dinosaurs are a sprawling family of lizard-like animals that were the dominant species on the planet for nearly 135 million years.
Putting the two together is a recipe for side-splitting laughter.
Reko Rivera, the athlete behind this video, isn't just an American Ninja Warrior: he's an American hero for making his desk-bound followers laugh as hard as I did when I first saw this thing. God bless you, Rivera ... and please, do a stegosaurus next!
